alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 3:33PM EST until January 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. The snow may mix with sleet at times Wednesday night. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. * WHERE...In New York, Western Clinton County. In Vermont, Lamoille and Eastern Franklin Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed 1 inch per hour at times Wednesday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
